snippet: Volkswagen AG's lead in China's compact sedan market this year has helped a handful of German marques sell almost as many passenger cars as China's 25 local brands combined - a trend industry watchers say can only lead to consolidation....

headline.print_headline: In China, Volkswagen Thinks Small to Score Big
headline.main: In China, Volkswagen Thinks Small to Score Big

lead_paragraph: Volkswagen AG's lead in China's compact sedan market this year has helped a handful of German marques sell almost as many passenger cars as China's 25 local brands combined - a trend industry watchers say can only lead to consolidation.
